branchCategory.name: MK-Z
branchCategory.description: <p>Swing clamp cylinder series MK-Z has a high allowable moment of inertia.&nbsp; The typical application for the MK-Z is to hold parts during a welding application.&nbsp; A short overall length means that the MK-Z series is versatile in mounting.&nbsp; Auto switches can be mounted on any of the 4 surfaces with no projection of the switch.</p>

branchItem.name: MK-Z Swing Clamp Cylinder, Standard w/Auto Switch Mounting Grooves
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's MK-Z is a rotary clamp cylilnder that has a high allowable moment of inertia.  The typical application for the MK-Z is to hold parts during a welding application.  A short overall length means that the MK-Z series is versatile in mounting.  Auto switches can be mounted on any of the 4 surfaces with no projection of the switch.</p>
